backend/main.mo: Defines product, order, and payment types; initializes product catalog and sets up maps for payments, orders, and download tokens.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI and functionality requirements to specific frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with OKLCH color tokens and dark mode variables for the premium gradient UI.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, meta tags, and the root element for mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with simple hash-based routing and theme/query providers.
frontend/src/components/CheckoutDialog.t: Checkout dialog allowing users to select a payment method, create orders, and handle payment link or fallback flows.
frontend/src/components/EbookStoreSectio: Fetches and displays the four featured ebooks with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedCoursesS: Fetches and displays the four featured courses with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/FloatingWhatsApp: Renders a fixed floating WhatsApp button linking to a generated WhatsApp URL.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays site footer with about info, contact details, social links, and dynamic copyright.
frontend/src/components/GlassCard.tsx: Provides a reusable glass-style card wrapper with optional custom classes.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the top navigation bar with logo, page navigation, and WhatsApp contact button.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with background image, title, CTAs for courses, ebooks, and WhatsApp join link.
frontend/src/components/OrderStatusBadge: Shows an order status badge with color variants for different order states.
frontend/src/components/PricingOffersSec: Displays bundled pricing offers using cards, badges, feature lists, and purchase buttons.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Shows product details with image, price, and a button that opens a checkout dialog.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Simple layout wrapper that constrains content width and applies spacing.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialsSect: Renders testimonial cards with student images, ratings, and quotes.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppBanner.t: Promotional banner encouraging users to contact support via WhatsApp with a CTA button.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseSection: Renders a marketing section listing feature cards with icons for AI Academy. Builds a grid of GlassCard components mapped from a FEATURES array.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes. Initializes access control using a secret token if authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useCheckout.ts: Provides mutations to create payment orders and fetch payment links using the backend actor. Invalidates download queries on successful order creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and provider for Internet Identity auth, loading stored identities and exposing login, logout, and status helpers. Wraps the app to supply identity via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines product, order, and download-related queries and mutations using the backend actor. Includes functions for fetching products, marking orders as paid, and validating download tokens.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles and custom CSS variables for theming, including light/dark mode tokens. Adds global typography and gradient animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider. Renders the main App component and loads global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/DownloadGatePage.tsx: Validates a download token and displays download readiness or errors, allowing the user to download an ebook file. Uses UI components and mutation hooks to handle validation state.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Assembles the main landing page with header, hero, featured sections, testimonials, pricing, and WhatsApp components. Includes scroll-to-section behavior for courses and ebooks.
frontend/src/pages/MyDownloadsPage.tsx: React page that lists user ebook orders, lets them mark orders as paid, and navigate to download via token generation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL or session-based parameters with support for hash routing.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Generates a WhatsApp chat URL with an optional prefilled message.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing site purpose, architecture notes, unresolved requirements, and image and feature lists.
